values.value: Site Critical Element* - Minimum of 2 Competent Climbers/Rescuers are required on site for any elevated work, all other elevated personnel must possess Authorized Climber and/or Authorized Rescuer certifications. Any employee engaged in any activity that presents the possibility of a fall from 6ft or higher requires each employee to be trained in fall protection to ANSI Z359 standards. Employees working on a tower structure are required to have training to ANSI Z359 and NATE CTS standards. Certifications must be issued by the company the employee works for. CFR 1926.502 (D),ANSI Z359.1
Do employees that are exposed to falls 6 ft. or greater have documented training?
